feed.title: Port au Choix - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 5:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: ESE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain or periods of rain this evening then to periods of rain near midnight. Fog patches in onshore winds overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then southeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches in onshore winds. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Fog patches in onshore winds in the evening and after midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
